scripts.dev:cloud: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts
scripts.predev: echo 'Formatting...' && npm run format && echo 'Linting...' && npm run lint && echo 'Building...' && npm run build

scriptsInfo.start: Start the production server (requires build first).
scriptsInfo.build: Compile TypeScript to JavaScript and resolve path aliases.
scriptsInfo.dev: Start development server with hot reload (uses .env for Cloud First).
scriptsInfo.dev:cloud: Force development mode with cloud services.
scriptsInfo.docker:up: Start the application container (uses docker-compose.yml with .env).
scriptsInfo.docker:up:local: Start the application container locally (uses docker-compose.yml with .env).
scriptsInfo.docker:up:dev: Start the application container for dev region (uses docker-compose.dev.yml with .env.development).
scriptsInfo.docker:up:prod: Start the application container for prod region (uses docker-compose.prod.yml with .env.production).
scriptsInfo.docker:down:local: Stop the local application container (uses docker-compose.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:down:dev: Stop the dev region application container (uses docker-compose.dev.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:down:prod: Stop the prod region application container (uses docker-compose.prod.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:build: Build the application Docker image (uses docker-compose.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:build:local: Build the local application Docker image (uses docker-compose.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:build:dev: Build the dev region application Docker image (uses docker-compose.dev.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:build:prod: Build the prod region application Docker image (uses docker-compose.prod.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:logs: Show live logs from the application container (uses docker-compose.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:logs:local: Show live logs from the local application container (uses docker-compose.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:logs:dev: Show live logs from the dev region application container (uses docker-compose.dev.yml).
scriptsInfo.docker:logs:prod: Show live logs from the prod region application container (uses docker-compose.prod.yml).
